alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 4:14PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Campbell County through 500 PM MDT... At 413 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Weston, or 22 miles north of Gillette, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Weston around 425 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rockypoint. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for northeastern Wyoming.
